scripts.say: Eek! My radar and engine have been hit... I can't continue fighting... I'm sorry...
Tsk... I don't have time for you little worms! I have more important things to do!
Oh, are you going to run away once more? How unfortunate, I had just started enjoying myself...
Sheffield, what's your current status? Will you be able to pursue her?
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble with my engine... I won't be able to pursue at maximum speed.
Understood. But, I would wager that she's bluffing and will turn to attack the convoy soon enough. How soon do you think you can affect repairs?
A reasonable assumption. But if we can't repair quickly, you're intent upon going after her... alone?
Those sisters have caused the Royal Navy far too much trouble... We have been given a chance to make them pay, and I will not let it slip by!
